Package game.actions

Class SwapWeaponAction

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.PickUpItemAction
game.actions.SwapWeaponAction
public class SwapWeaponAction
extends PickUpItemAction
An action to swap weapon (new weapon replaces old weapon). It loops through all items in the Actor inventory. The old weapon will be gone. TODO: you may update this code if required.
